participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Reflective and imaginative, often lost in thought and introspection.
participant_1.background: Grew up in a small town, surrounded by nature, which has influenced her passion for creativity and solitude.

participant_2.name: Max
participant_2.personality: Empathetic and supportive, enjoys engaging in deep conversations about life and emotions.
participant_2.background: A city dweller with a background in psychology, he often finds meaning in understanding the human experience.

content.text: am I dead? I'm scared of dying
that's why knitting is my passion for feeling alive
i've a dogs living all around my lonely house
the country wide bake sale is where i feel most at home because i was born at wide bake sale few years ago
someday you will be calling out my name but you won't get an answer
